Synopsis:
---------
State of New York, seventies. Irving Rosenfeld (Christian Bale), a brilliant con artist , and his smart and seductive companion Sydney Prosser (Amy Adams ) are forced to work for a stormy FBI agent , Richie dimaso (Bradley Cooper), who unwittingly drags the dangerous world politics and the Mafia in New Jersey.
